attributes.action: Make Flybe's inconsistent paper and metal baggage measuring devices illegal.
attributes.additional_details: This is unfair, unethical and needs regulating. Photos and videos of these devices have been taken and also staff at London City Airport have written in support of this scam.
attributes.background: Flybe measuring devices on hand baggage of 55x20x35 are ineffectively and inconsistently measuring bags and forcing passengers into fines of £50, multiple times per flight. Devices are both metal and paper and are different between airports and within airports.

rejection.details: The baggage policy is set by the relevant airline. You may wish to complain directly to them, or if you have already done so and are not satisfied with their response, you may wish to contact the Alternative Dispute Resolution (ADR) scheme: https://www.aviationadr.org.uk/about-aviationadr/
